scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npm --prefix ../frontend install; npm --prefix ../frontend run build; Copy-Item -Path ../frontend/dist -Destination dist -Recurse -Force
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild || echo 'No changes to commit' && git push
